Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2012 02:18AM - edited Feb 24, 2012 02:34AM by MuddyGlasses I want to add something that I didn't see in this very useful list -- I had very bad stomach gastritis and took Pepcid for it -- well, it was a mistake -- the Pepsid made my mouth and tongue even "hairier", and also I had horrible heart burn from it, my throat super dry and burning. Once I stopped the Pepcid and started taking glutamine for the gastritis, it was all well. (this is not glucosamine, it is GLUTAMINE -- helps the lining of the stomach.) Eni PS: if you like, check out the art I've been recently creating to help the healing process: muddyglasses.com/cancerclub/ch... . Thanks!
